description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ye Olde Dice Game is fun for the entire family. Enjoy some medieval dice rolling and soothing music. I know I do! Has a high score list to keep track of your best games as well. What are you waiting for? Try the trial!
